actor.headline: Driftsleder

given.caption: October 22, 2012, Rasmus Bjørn was Randi Kraft’s client
given.text:
Randi har gentagne gange påtaget sig opgaver hos RAZspa og gentagne gange har vi med stor tilfredshed taget imod kunders ros af Randi.

Randi spænder over en stor og bred viden og hendes ide med at se muligheder frem for begrensninger har gjort hende til en yndet arbejdskraft hos os. Det er ikke sjældent at vi ringer tl Randi og beder om hendes hjælp, og det er med beklagelse at vi pt. ikke har en fast stilling til hende.

I er velkommen til at kontakte mig med evt. spørgsmål på mit direkte nummer: 26 20 66 69.

Hilsen Raz

RAZspa.

work_experience.description: As a digital editor at DR - Danmarks Radio, I spearheaded the development of a news platform for a younger audience, focusing on delivering public service news to a tough demographic. Leading a team of twelve reporters, we created five new formats and grew subscribers from 8000 to 90,000 organically. My efforts in innovative news format development have garnered attention and allowed me to present our work to Nordic and European partners.

• Led the digital transformation of the TV department at Metroxpress A/S, aligning closely with sales and marketing for innovative development.
• Developed new social values to supplement traditional news values, contributing to increased readership under 30.
• Key player in Denmark's successful social media editorial team, driving the company's digital strategy forward.

As Head of tv2.dk at TV 2 DANMARK A/S in Copenhagen, I led a team in developing engaging journalism and formats for the frontpage. I managed a small team of frontpage editors and ensured alignment between the digital, TV, and news departments. By strategically placing content, I increased frontpage engagement and collaborated with cross-functional teams to optimize user experience and drive traffic.

As Head of Digital News at TV 2 DANMARK A/S, I spearheaded the station's digital transformation, managing a team of 35 across News, Weather, and Sports. I led breaking news coverage, social media strategies, and trained teams on digital reporting. Additionally, I innovated the coverage of municipal elections with a new 7-hour live digital format, aligning with traditional broadcast methods.

• Led the digital transformation at TV 2 DANMARK A/S, introducing new sports formats and managing a 10-member team.
• Integrated digital coverage with the broadcast department, overseeing breaking news and social media strategies.
• Trained and supervised digital field teams on breaking news coverage, enhancing overall digital sports presence.

• Developed new formats and collaborations with external production companies in the digital TV department at Ekstra Bladet.
• Managed a 7-member staff focusing on News, culture, politics, and Sports, ensuring budget adherence and team productivity.

• Managed content alignment between the website, newspaper, and TV department for the biggest Danish national news site, eb.dk.
• Oversaw front-page editing responsibilities to ensure timely and engaging news coverage.
• Collaborated with teams to optimize content delivery and enhance user experience on the platform.

• Worked as a newsreporter on the newsdesk and at the sportsdesk.
• Also worked with investigative documentarys for both departments.
• Worked for a couple of years as a livereporter. Primary sports.

Outside field productions such as:

• Mens Handball World Cup / Germany 2007
• The Olympics / China 2008 
• Mens Handball European championship / Austria 2010
• Mens Handball World Cup / Sweden 2011
• Football coverage as SNG and ENG reporter. Danish National team, Superliga, and international competitions.
• Documentarys for LPS, Dags Dato, Station 2.

I have had the pleasure of working with Joe Ryan at Better Collective where he has consistently demonstrated a high level of engagement and creativity in his role. Joe is both respected and valued by his colleagues and team members. His ability to balance strategic thinking with day-to-day execution has made him a highly valued team member.

I recommend Joe Ryan without reservation for any role requiring creativity, strategic thinking, and a hands-on approach to content creation.

received.caption: January 31, 2015, Michael managed Guri directly
received.text: I have had the pleasure of working with Guri from 2011 to 2015. First and foremost, Guri is a source of inspiration and appetite for life that will benefit any organisation. She is also a highly valued colleague. I was her line manager from 2011-2014 in Customer Marketing in the Nordics. Guri started as a Commercial Planning and Activation Manager for On Trade in Norway where she showcased her skills in getting customers engaged around our brands. She executed several large scale events and activations and participation with key customers was always sky high just as the quality of the activations was always top class which really characterizes Guri. Her work is always in impeccable quality and she holds herself to very high standards. After a while, I promotes her to PR Manager Nordics in which she leveraged her vast network and inclusive personality to build a strong platform for PR. She delivered the strongest PR programs we have ever seen in Diageo Nordics. Finally, Guri has a global outlook and a positive attitude that enables her to succeed with people from most walks of life

She is sharp and understands the value of a dynamic team in order to achieve the best results. It has been inspirational and a real joy, working together with such a great professional and person.

The Director of Conferences and Events at Marble agency

Position & Responsibilities

- Develops a comprehensive, proactive, and clearly defined annual strategic plan for corporate events. Delegates coordination and event management tasks to the Corporate Events Coordinator to ensure the delivery of high-quality events aligned with Marble Agency’s standards.

- Leads the design and execution of corporate events aimed at generating new or increased revenue, while enhancing participant and volunteer engagement within Marble Agency’s priority markets.

- Creates and implements event strategies and relationship-building activities to effectively recruit, acknowledge, and retain volunteers, donors, teams, and participants. This includes personal cultivation and solicitation of sponsorships and gifts in line with established annual goals.

- Collaborates with all Marble Agency staff to identify, nurture, and steward leadership volunteers, teams, and participants, fostering strong partnerships and ongoing engagement.

- Oversees a coordinated process to secure and manage national and regional cash sponsorships, retail partnerships, in-kind donations, media support, and materials. This involves proposal development, prospect identification, cultivation, solicitation, recognition, and retention efforts.

- Works closely with Marketing and Communications teams to ensure participant recruitment, engagement, and fundraising tools are effectively optimized.

- Prepares event budgets, provides regular progress updates for each project, and monitors event-related finances to ensure fiscal responsibility and success.

Business & Concept Developer

The Four Universe Exhibition & Expo is a new initiative for CIOOA, designed to enhance B2B and B2C engagement in the Nordic market of 25 million people.

My role involves:

 Identifying Opportunities: Staying updated on industry trends, competitor offerings, and market insights to spot new business prospects aligned with our strategic goals.

Creative Development: Innovating ways to boost sales and growth by exploring new markets, channels, and potential co-branded products or services.

Prioritization: Assessing opportunities through financial analysis to determine the most promising initiatives.

 Implementation & Negotiation: Building strategic partnerships and negotiating deals to successfully execute these opportunities.

Project at Marriott Copenhagen

Overview:
This initiative encompasses Show and Event PR integration, digital PR strategies, the relaunch of upcoming brands, and the launch of new products. It leverages innovative PR tactics through collaboration with in-house departments and external agencies to maximize impact.

Objectives:
- Raise awareness of the Lobby Bar Pier 5 and the Terrace.
- Establish an information platform and exhibition venue.
- Create a dynamic, creative forum showcasing both emerging and established Danish artists, musicians, designers, and brands.

Concept:
Inspired by the ‘pop-up store’ trend—temporary retail spaces open for a limited time—the exhibition will operate as a short-term event, lasting one or two days. Each week, the exhibition will feature a different theme, such as:

- Week 1: Educational Opportunities  
- Week 2: Tourism  
- Week 3: Fashion and Design  
- Week 4: Art, Music, and Sustainability

Within each themed period, the platform will focus on promoting and sharing information about the participating artists, designers, musicians, and companies, fostering engagement and highlighting Denmark’s creative talent.

CAVI		       	København K

	PR-manager / Salgskonsulent
•	Ansvarshavende for events
•	Planlægning og udførsel af markedsføringsstrategi
•	Opsøgende salg B+B
•	Anskaffede sponsorer bl.a. Calvin Klein
•	Forøgelse fra 3 mil. Kr. til 11,3 mil. Kr. på under 1 år

work_experience.description:
Rejsekonsulent hos Dalhoff Travel
Tidligere i stilling som hhv. praktikant og studentermedarbejder

Gode kundeoplevelser gennem en moderne smag af Sverige.

Arbejdsopgaver:
- Servicering af kunder 
- Deltage i den daglige produktion af mad

Yderligere arbejdsopgaver som følge af Covid-19:
- Plukke varer fra varehuset
- Udlevering af ordrer til kunder

I forbindelse med mit arbejde hos Eventcom ApS har mine opgaver inkluderet indledende afdækning af virksomhedens kunders behov samt reservation af flybilletter, hoteller, transporter, restaurant, aktiviteter.
Herunder har jeg forhandlet annullerings- og ændringsbetingelser med virksomhedens leverandører samt forhandlet priser. 
Tilmed har jeg udarbejdet tilbud og rejseplaner til virksomhedens kunder og tilrettelagt disse efter kundens behov i forbindelse med rejsen. 
Ydermere har jeg udarbejdet afrejsedokumenter og foretaget faktureringer i forbindelse med rejsen.

Som concessionsælger i Palads, har jeg haft ansvar for hele concession på den givne vagt, hvor man som O/18 har mellem 3-7 piccoloer på, hvor motivering og ledelse har været en stor faktor i mit arbejde. Jeg trives derfor med at arbejde i teams, men også med at tage styringen hvis der er behov for det. 

I mit arbejde som concessionsælger hos Nordisk Film Biografer Palads, blev jeg beskrevet som en ekstraordinær serviceminded person samt detaljeorienteret og perfektionistisk. Dette munder ud i, at jeg har et stort overblik, holder øje med de mindste detaljer og ikke bare ser en kunde som én i mængden, men at jeg ønsker at skabe den rette løsning til den enkelte.

Ydermere har jeg gennemført kurser i servicetræning og konfliktløsning.

Ved mit arbejde i Silvan fungerede jeg som sælger samt kassemedarbejder. Jeg har dermed både erfaring med, at stå bag kassen og hjælpe folk med deres spørgsmål, angående butikkens produkter samt sælge disse. Jeg har erfaring med at arbejde i et team, hvor man også skal kunne fungere selvstændigt og tage beslutninger. Det er samtidig min opfattelse og min erfaring, at det er vigtigt at kunne tage initiativ for at bidrage til et godt samarbejde.
I løbet af min ansættelse har jeg også været på diverse kurser. Her har jeg været på kursurs i anvendelse af maling og butikkens udvalg af disse.  
Jeg har også været på havekursus med fokus på plæneklippere, Ecostyle samt blomster.

json.summary:
Som Mindset Mentor og Coach
hjælper jeg dig med at skabe klarhed, vækst og stå stærkt i dit liv og din business.
Sammen fjerner vi det, der spænder ben, så du kan begynde at leve det liv, du længes efter, med frihed, retning og balance.
Uden at du skal gå på kompromis med dig selv.

Du er skabt til lederskab.
Du er skabt til gennembrud.
Du skal bare begynde at tro det.

🔹 Mit fokus er vækst, gennembrud, selvledelse og strategi.
🔹 Jeg arbejder værdibaseret, med frihed, ansvar, ro, kærlighed, omsorg, selvledelse og bæredygtig vækst som grundpiller.

Min kristne tro er mit fundament og gennemsyrer den måde, jeg møder andre på, med respekt, kærlighed, ærlighed og integritet.

Jeg tror på, at sand forandring starter indefra.

Du kan skabe en business, og et liv, der både er indbringende og meningsfuldt, uden at miste dig selv undervejs.

Min tilgang er ærlig, målrettet og rodfæstet i stærke værdier.

Mentoring og sparring til dig, der er klar til at tage dit liv til næste niveau.

Er du klar til dit gennembrud?

Send mig en besked, så tager vi første skridt sammen.

json.headline: Board member with expertise in recurring revenue, subscriptions and digital transformation. Offering Knowledge-as-a-Service as advisor and consultant

education.degree: Bachelor's degree, Communication and Media Studies

work_experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
work_experience.description:
Strong expertise in Subscription Business Models and Digital Transformation. Associated with Subscrybe (leading Nordic consulting agency on subscription based business models), Globeteam (strong expertise in digital transformation) and bro kommunikation (expertise in organisation culture, leadership development and behavioural design).

As an independent advisor on international media consultancy jobs, I partner with former New York Times and (US) and Aftenposten (NO) executives: 
https://astridjorgensen.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/FINAL-Espen-Yasmin-Astrid-Introductory-Letter.docx.pdf
Subscription based business models
Behavioural design, leadership, organisational development
Digital transformation

P&L responsibility for Denmark’s biggest newspaper, Politiken and Børneavisen as well as, as chairman of the board, Monitormedier and Politiken History (magazine). Commercial organisation in reference. 

SUBSCRIPTION BUSINESS MODELS: Sales, retention and customer journeys. Growth in revenue and profit. Radical structural changes from print to digital.

DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION: International best in class financially sustainable digital media transformation: Same contribution margin digitally and print and growing revenue and profit margin in the transition period. 
- Product development: Pricing, bundling and refinement of product portfolio - always with uncompromising starting point in target group understanding and user needs (jobs to be done).
- Proces: Program management, e.g. as  steering group chairman for replacement of the group subscription platform to Zuora (Ekstra Bladet, Jyllands-Posten, Watch Medier, Politiken, et al.)
- Organisational development (people): From print newspaper to a digital media company undergoing major cultural changes (leadership, diversity, #metoo, etc.).

MANAGEMENT & LEADERSHIP: I believe in results through trust,  dialogue, respect, psychological security, collaboration, involving  communication and employee well-being, also in hard times:
- Development and implementation of diversity strategy. Significant improvements after a short time on gender, age and equal pay.
- Structurered leadership development for all managers focusing on bias and necessary organisational cultural changes after among other things, #metoo.
- Initiator and lead developer of new salary model ‘equal pay for equal work’ defining salary ranges across four collective union agreements + management contracts. All new employees are paid according to the model and existing employees are (re)assessed, when they get new roles  and / or responsibilities.

Head of Sales and Marketing: Total subscription revenue, BtC & BtB. Acquisition and retention of subscribers both digitally and via telemarketing. CRM, campaigns, digital infrastructure, customer journeys, subscription handling, payment methods, customer satisfaction.
16 managers and employees in reference.

Head of digital subscription sales and marketing at Politiken: acquisition and retention of digital subscribers Focusing on CRM, campaigns, digital infrastructure, customer journeys, subscription handling, payment methods, single sign on.

Chairman of the Board for Monitormedier (monitormedier.dk) that publishes nine digital media targeted at private and public professionals within their field of work: Climate change, urban development, health, education, culture, tourism, public sports, senior and social policy. A remarkable and unusual growth story in today's media landscape, both nationally and internationally.

- Strategy development 
- M&A (Kulturmonitor)
- Outsourcing of sales organisation: From lacking results to growth above budget.

Subscription based business experience, digital development and modern management ensuring a sound, thus high performing culture.

work_experience.company: Politikens Udviklingsselskab (Magasinerne Politiken Historie og Politiken MAD)
work_experience.description:
Chairperson of the Board for Politikens Udviklingsselskab publishing the magazine Politiken Historie (politikenhistorie.dk).

Previously also the magazine Politiken Mad (food magazine, closed in 2021)

Commercially responsible for strategy development and implementation, traffic managing and budgets on Bonnier Publications'​ cross border portfolio on health and fitness in close collaboration with editorial and technical departments. Main titles in the portfolio: "iForm"​ and "Aktiv træning" in four countries (Denmark, Norway, Sweden, Finland). 

New concepts and projects with regard to the project portfolio in collaboration with Business Development, Business Intelligence (BI) and Project Management Office (PMO) 

Representing business needs with regard to technical development, infrastructure and platforms.

Commercially responsible for EKSTRA, Ekstra Bladet's digital subscription plan (paid content), alongside with digital customer relations and Ekstra Bladet's infrastructural share in JP/Politikens Hus: SingleSignOn, payments and digital subscription solutions. 
Areas of focus: Paid content, CRM, product development, retention, churn prevention, loyality schemes, pricing structures.

Responsible for communication on digital subscriptions in JP/Politikens Hus (Ekstra Bladet, Jyllands-Posten and Politiken). Creating shared knowledge base corporately on digital subscriptions and paid content. 
Keywords: Paid content, payments, digital subscription solutions, freemium model, metered model, check-out flows, SingleSignOn, corporate paid content solutions, PR, product development, retention.

Two year traineeship in project management and business development. The traineeship comprises four stays of each six months duration throughout JP/Politikens Hus A/S.

3rd trainee period in the digital division of Politikens Lokalaviser: User driven communities, SEO, online editable catalogue for local companies, RSS, web-tv koncepts, comparative analysis of local media's online initiatives, user manuals, FAQs, etc.

As a part of the trainee program: Comprehensive concern project on web-tv, covering inhouse solutions, various web-tv solutions in Denmark and abroad, future web-tv trends, perspectives and future recommendations. 

Also, the traineeship comprises courses and seminars in i.e. communications, corporate finance and personal development.
Various IT integration, community development (photo sharing and travel blogs), editorial tasks, PR, marketing, implementation of ticket search engine, content exchange with external media.

Development and implementation of new online book shops: Co-working on project management, UI, layout, etc.

Marketing and PR in relation to the release of a new novel series. 

Various new media projects, internal communication, working procedures etc.

certifications.name: Certificate issued to Astrid Jørgensen by Selectionf. A secure TRUE original document.

json.summary:
Strong expertise in subscription business models, digital transformation, value creating product offers and the human aspects of organisational transformation.

Most of my professional career has been devoted to in digital transformation of a legacy business, creating value via subscription-based business models whilst tirelessly focused on target groups and deep understanding of user needs. I am renowned for strong stakeholder management and psychological safety - prerequisites to effectively create business value via high performing teams, not least in organisations undergoing radical and transformative change. 

In my consultancy business I am associated with Subscrybe (leading consulting agency on subscription based business models), Globeteam (experts in digital transformation) and bro kommunikation (organisational culture, leadership development and behavioural design). 

On international media consultancy jobs, I am partnering with former New York Times (US) and Aftenposten (NO) executives: https://astridjorgensen.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/FINAL-Espen-Yasmin-Astrid-Introductory-Letter.docx.pdf

I get along in eight languages, a handful on a professional level: Danish (native), English, French, Norwegian and Swedish (professional), Italian and German (skilled) and Spanish (tourist)

Don't hesitate to reach out with questions, challenges, ideas or specific projects:
astrid@astridjorgensen.com  
Full profile and contact info: https://astridjorgensen.com/

Background
I draw on 17 years of experience from leading Scandinavian media groups, JP/Politikens Hus and Bonnier Publications, and extensive national and international networks both in and outside the media industry.
Senior responsibilities since 2013, including five years in top management as commercially responsible (P&L responsibility) for Denmark’s largest newspaper, Politiken: A rare media growth story with increase in revenue and margin whilst undergoing transformation from print to digital. 

Five years chairperson of the board at Monitormedier and Politikens Udviklingsselskab and commercially responsible for Børneavisen, award-winning children's newspaper.

As a commercial director I have been leading major organisational changes on Diversity, Equity and Inclusion with proven results on gender equality and development and implementation of "equal pay for equal work"-model across four different union agreements and management contracts. Strong in bias handling, leadership development, organisational, cultural and behavioural change.

given.caption: May 28, 2024, Astrid was senior to Cathrine but didn't manage Cathrine directly
given.text: Jeg har haft glæden af at arbejde sammen med Cathrine både som kollega og i en periode også som hendes nærmeste chef i Politikens erhvervs-abonnementssalg, hvor Cathrine var ansat fra 2014 til 2024. Cathrine var en nøgleperson i opbygningen af afdelingen, bl.a. som lead på kundeoverblik, værditilbud/infomateriale, kommunikation og oplæring af kundeservice, salg- og kontraktforhandling, m.m. Cathrine er en gevinst som kollega, både fagligt og menneskeligt. Hun er en positiv og konstruktiv teamplayer med stærke samarbejdsevner, overblik og forståelse for interessenters og kunders behov. I tillæg er hun meget struktureret, pligtopfyldende, arbejdsom og en yderst vellidt kollega, der spiller andre gode. Både i projektlederarbejde og som garant for høj kvalitet med afsæt i kunders interessentbehov, er Cathrine et stærkt kort. Med høj integritet på både faglig kvalitet og menneskelige værdier, giver jeg Cathrine mine varmeste anbefalinger og står altid til rådighed som reference. /Astrid Jørgensen, kommerciel direktør, Politiken

actor.headline: Administration | Kundeservice | Procesoptimering

given.caption: October 9, 2022, Astrid worked with Søren on the same team
given.text: Jeg har haft fornøjelsen af at arbejde sammen med Søren gennem mange år og i forskellige roller i JP/Politikens Hus, både med Søren som egen leder og senere som ledelseskollega. Søren er en fantastisk leder med stor forretningsmæssig indsigt kombineret med en altid stor lydhørhed for nye perspektiver og input. Søren er en holdspiller med stort strategisk blik og interesse. Han bygger bro og skaber mening mellem retning og nødvendige handlinger, og han har en stærk evne til at få organisation, teams og den enkelte medarbejder til at udvikles og trives, både i opgangs- og svære tider. Søren er loyal, lydhør og med dyb digital indsigt, der altid vil skabe værdi for virksomheder og organisationer der har digital transformation, teknologiudnyttelse og ledelse på dagsordenen.

actor.headline: Business Manager - Risk & Security @Globeteam

given.caption: December 11, 2017, Astrid managed Anne directly
given.text: Jeg havde fornøjelsen at være chef for Anne på Bonnier Publications. Anne er super dygtig i rejsen fra strategiudvikling til identifikation af koncepter og produkter - altid med afsæt i den udviklede strategi og med øje på forretningen. Udvikling af prototyper med stærk involvering af brugerne er i de bedste hænder hos Anne. Samtidig er Anne en skøn kollega som stortrives i spændet mellem kreativitet og det at arbejde sammen med dygtige og engagerede mennesker.

actor.headline: Ledelse | Lead Management | E-commerce | Digital annoncering | E-mail Marketing | Content

given.caption: April 7, 2015, Astrid worked with Kim on the same team
given.text: Among several grand projects, Kim has been the UX and design mastermind behind the launch of EKSTRA, Ekstra Bladet’s paid digital subscriptions. Kim is extremely visionary, talented, experienced and also an exceptionally kind and likable person. Any project can and will benefit from Kim's professionalism and guidance. I therefore give Kim my warmest recommendations – and I look forward to our continuous collaborations in the future.

actor.headline: CEO and Founder at Bjooks Publishing

given.caption: June 14, 2013, Astrid was Simon’s client
given.text: I have worked closely together with Simon on a major project moving Ekstra Bladet's editorial and commercial newsletters as well as ad hoc e-mails to a new provider. Simon was the responsible technical project manager on the provider side. It has been a pleasure working closely together with Simon who is very service minded, extremely helpful and calm in stressed situations. I recommend Simon as a highly skilled technical project manager and a very kind guy.

actor.headline: Director at FlowStack ApS

given.caption: June 12, 2013, Astrid was Steen’s client
given.text:
Steen Lehmann has worked at Ekstra Bladet Development from December 2012-June 2013. During these 6+ months, Steen has been the responsible developer for the technical implementation of Ekstra Bladet’s digital subscription plan, EKSTRA. 

Steen is extremely thorough, competent and, not least, very calm in stressful situations. The implementation has been very challenging and complex due to integrations between various subscription, payment and CMS systems, and Steen has handled these situations exemplarily with his calm and knowledgeable approach. 

I will not hesitate to contact Steen regarding future tasks and I hereby give him my best recommendations.

actor.headline: Senior Engineering Manager at Zendesk

given.caption: January 11, 2011, Astrid was senior to Kristine Ersted but didn't manage Kristine Ersted directly
given.text:

json.summary:
Erfaren leder inden for service, salg og events med særlig vægt på samarbejde, kommunikation og kundeoplevelse.
I mere end 25 år har jeg skabt resultater og trivsel i roller med ledelse, kundeservice, salg og eventkoordinering og med et stærkt kommercielt fokus. 
Jeg motiveres af at løfte teams, skabe relationer og udvikle serviceoplevelser, der skaber værdi for både kunder og kollegaer.

Jeg er engageret og meget målrettet og har højt energiniveau. Har en stærk intuition og naturlig evne til at skabe relationer. Jeg er positiv, kommunikerende og kreativ – trives med at igangsætte, inspirere og bygge bro mellem mennesker og muligheder.

work_experience.description: I digidar producerer vi reklame, præsentations- og animationsfilm i tæt samarbejde med reklamebureauer og virksomheder. En filmreklamefilm skal som udgangspunkt kunne fange forbrugerens opmærksomhed, styrke dit image og øge dit salg. Og det vigtigste i digidar er, at gøre alt dette på den flotteste og mest professionelle måde.
Medstifter og ejer af filmselvskabet/webbureauet digidar.dk. Står for den daglige drift og kommunikation ud af til. Varetager heribandt også digidars kontrakter og salgsaftaler.

Dansk Flyttetransport er et flyttefirma, der har hovedsæde i Aalborg i Nordjylland. Vi er dog ikke geografisk begrænsede og kører gerne i hele Danmark, lige meget hvilke flytteopgaver du har til os. Vi har efterhånden en del års erfaring som flyttefirma, hvilket har givet os en stor viden og en faglig stolthed, som vi tager med os ind i vores daglige arbejde.

Privatflytning, firmaflytning og transport
Vores erfaring har gjort os eksperter på en lang række områder, og vi kan derfor tilbyde at hjælpe dig med langt de fleste opgaver, som kan opstå i forbindelse med en flytning. Først og fremmest står vi klar til at hjælpe dig, hvad end din flytning er i privat eller erhvervsmæssig sammenhæng. Vi ved, at der kan være mange overvejelser og udfordringer, når det kommer til at skulle flytte fra et hjem til et andet, og vi gør en dyd ud af at gøre flytningen af dine private ejendele nem og effektiv. Det gør sig også gældende i forbindelse med firmaflytninger, hvor vi er parate til at varetage flytningen for dig, så du kan skåne dine medarbejdere og undgå alt det omstændige ved en sådan flytning.

json.headline: Ejendomshandler
json.location: Copenhagen Metropolitan Area

work_experience.description: Udvikler og hjælper med at sælge gode ejendommen, både privat og erhverv.

Vælg rigtigt første gang, mange sælgere vælger mægler på baggrund af en høj vurdering eller et lavt salær. Begge dele er forkert, medmindre man få bakket beslutningen op af kompetencer.  

En kendt frase i branchen sæt den højeste pris, og du får ejendommen til salg, så kan den altid sættes den ned senere, der er jo 6 mdr. at løbe på. 
Og sjovt nok er det, det der sker i mange tilfælde, men selvfølgelig ikke i stigende markeder så vokser ejendommen ind i markedet over tid, og vil blive solgt til den højere pris, end ejendommen måske umiddelbart var værd da den kom på markedet. Problemet i dette er - mange sælgere skal jo videre i markedet og oftes skal man købe noget større, og så er dette også steget - bare mere, og derfor har beslutningen om at holde den høje pris, i sidste ende været en dyr beslutning. 

Hos Boligeksklusiv bruger vi megen tid på at sætte den rigtige pris fra start, og hjælpe vores kunder videre hurtigst muligt, for at hjælpe dem videre i deres nye hjem. Dette gør vi ikke skal bruge flere måneder på at sælge en ejendom, fordi vores fokus er at få den solgt nu til den rigtige pris.

Dette kræver dedikation og en målrettet indsats, derfor har vi heller ikke mere end maks. 10 ejendomme til salg pr. sælger, for vores kunder har ikke tid til at falde ned mellem stolene, som jeg ved er en følelse mange sælgere kender, når deres ejendom er sat til salg.

Når man sætter et maks. på 10 ejendomme pr sælger, så bliver ingen glemt, og alle får fokus og der kan holdes de åbnehuse og laves de fremvisninger der skal til, for at alle ejendomme bliver solgt.

Og succes for en godt salg er netop fokus, at kunne læse købere, hjælpe dem og opbygge tilliden, spørge efter ordren og få lukket handlen. 

Som jeg plejer at sige, hvis din mægler ikke har præcenteret dig for et bud inden for de første 4 fremvisninger, har han så overhovedet spurgt køberne om de vil købe?

Velkommen til Bolig Eksklusiv – din betroede ejendomsmægler i Nordsjælland og Storkøbenhavn. Vi fokuserer på at præsentere din bolig så lækkert og eksklusivt for køber som muligt.

Det er afgørende for os, at du får den bedst mulige pris for din bolig. Derfor involverer vores ejendomsmæglere sig dybt i dine ønsker og behov samt holder fokus på at gøre din bolig attraktiv på markedet.

Eksklusiv sagshåndtering og intelligent markedsføring
Bolig Eksklusiv er kendetegnet ved, at vi behandler vores kunder individuelt og holder et højt serviceniveau gennem hele salgs- og/eller købsprocessen. Vi ser det unikke i din bolig og finder ud af, hvor vi kan gøre en forskel.

Indehaver af en Ejendomsmæglerforretning, skills indenfor Ejendoms udvikling, Ejendoms investeringer, Projektsalg, Køber rådgivning, Real Estate - in all. Development, sales, consulting, investment. In Denmark and abroad.
All real estate.

-Overseeing the execution of operational tasks including budget management, billing and campaign creative trafficking
-Developing strong working relationships and with members of the broader digital account teams including planning, investment, operations and analytics
-Collaborating with agency teams and publishers to source, evaluate and implement deals that provide our clients with high quality inventory opportunities
-Creating and enforcing workflow processes to ensure deliverables are completed accurately and on time
-Conducting regular and ad hoc analysis to identify opportunities to improve performance within and across campaigns
-Keeping key stakeholders including clients and account teams updated on campaign and account level performance via regular and ad-hoc reporting and status meetings
-Contributing to the development of best practices to improve the quality or efficiency of work within an account or broader agency programmatic team

I was hired back at Ekstra Bladet as the first Programmatic Manager in a newly established Programmatic unit. The unit grew fast and we became a  team of specialists with each our key responsibilities. The unit performed so well, that after 7 months it was decided that we should become a JP / Politikens Hus unit, and take on the responsibility for all the programmatic business across the four media titles EKSTRA BLADET, JYLLANDS-POSTEN, FINANS and POLITIKEN.

Key Responsibilities: 

- Generate revenue through sales of programmatic inventory to clients and agency trading desks
- Partner with internal, cross-functional teams, including sales, ad operations and finance to develop programmatic strategy and provide first-class customer experience 
- Lead all programmatic sales efforts within the company
- Work with the sales team to support direct sales efforts and packaging of programmatic inventory
- Engage, strategize and cultivate relationships with senior-level clients and agency members
- Ensure maximum levels of client-facing customer service
- Maintain complete, updated status of all information relating to accounts
- Training, supporting and managing the day to day responsibilities and work of more junior team members

Working for a fresh startup AdTech company, was a great learning experience for me professionally. Beyond my role as a Key Account Manager it required a lot of flexibility and ad hoc tasks. The fast changing business environment meant that I had to wear several different hats in the 8 months I was working there.
Key responsibilities:   
- Developing a solid and trusting relationship between major key clients and company
- Developing a complete understanding of key account needs
- Managing communications between key clients and internal teams
- Negotiating contracts with the client and establishing a timeline of performance
- Establishing and overseeing internal budgets with the company and external budgets with the client
- Expanding relationships and bringing in new clients

As a Mobile Manager at Ekstra Bladet, I was part of a digital sales support team that worked to turn our advertisers’ focus over to mobile devices opportunities. 

Key Responsabilties:

- Working with design, sales team, creative, advertising, logistics, managers, marketing, and internal client team members from sales, platform development and design as well as the client’s creative agency to ensure the highest advertising quality and all client needs were met. 
- Collaborating with the sales team to maximize profit by up-selling or cross-selling
- Analyzing ad performance data and online user behavior to continuously provide the best possible solutions
- Anticipating changes in advertising trends and keeping up to date with the technological landscape to ensure we kept our leading position as the most innovative publisher platform for our clients’ advertising campaigns.

- Responsible for the campaign strategy and layout of the campaign plan.
- Resource management- both human and material.
- Political sparring and research on political issues and people of interest to help the candidate prepare for interviews, debates, meet & greet, political and networking events etc.. 
- Set up political events such as public debates with candidates from other parties.

As Student Peer Counsellor: 
A peer counselor is a qualified student trained to address a broad range of topics by providing one-on-one, confidential support to other students. As peer counselor I offered an encouraging atmosphere where students could talk openly about issues, challenges and accompanying feelings. I helped students develop solutions to their problems through the use of active listening, open dialogue and practical coping skills.

My thesis was a business plan for importing combustable waste from other countries in order to use the full capacity of the incineration also known as waste-to-energy (WTE) plant to increase energy earnings from sale of electricity and heat.

json.summary:
Med stor interesse og passion for interiør, design, indretning og styling, brænder jeg for som arkitekt og indretningsarkitekt stud. at dykke ned i plantegningen og skabe inspirerende og helstøbte miljøer, hvad enten det er indretning af private hjem, virksomhedsindretning eller indretning af showrooms, messer og shop-in-shop. Ved hjælp af den rette indretning og styling og blik for det overordnede visuelle udtryk, som afspejler kundens behov og ønsker eller virksomhedens DNA, skabes skræddersyede og unikke designløsninger med plads til udfoldelse af det hele menneske og som optimerer og eksekverer virksomhedens brandidentitet og salg.

Med baggrund som Arkitekt cand.polyt fra Aalborg Universitet samt erfaring fra mit arbejde som freelance arkitekt, arbejder jeg med ide- og konceptudvikling ud fra en holistisk tilgang og med et skarpt øje for detaljen og den røde tråd. Min baggrund har givet mig stor kendskab til og forståelse for materialer og konstruktioner samt solid erfaring med idegenerering, skitsering, detaljering, projektering, 3D modellering, visualisering, samt opsætning af præsentationsmateriale og visuel formidling.   

Mine stærke indlevelsesevner og min lydhørhed gør, at kundens ønsker og behov er i centrum, i hvert enkelt projekt. Herfra omsættes disse, ved hjælp af god tæt dialog og kreative processer, til skræddersyede og helstøbte designløsninger, hvor æstetik og funktion går op i en højere enhed.

json.headline: #Salg #Marketing #Brandaktivation #Netværk #SoMe #PR #Eventmarketing #Growth #Marketingsstrategi #Teambuilding #Annoncering
json.location: Denmark

work_experience.description:
Built and maintained relationships with B2B customers. Negotiated commercial agreements to optimize sales	and profitability. Acted as the primary point of contact, ensuring customer satisfaction and long-term partnerships.

STAR:
Situation: 
 - The company lacked qualified leads and needed further development of its brand universe
Task: 
 - The focus was to increase the number of leads through fitting sales and marketing activities
Actions: 
 - New website, new content, new SEO and social media strategy, and automated email flows
Results:	
 - Increased the number of inbound leads by 500% over 18 months
 - Implemented an inbound marketing strategy that generated 100+ new leads 
 - New leads through content marketing and SEO, resulting in a +700% increase in qualified leads
 - On-page SEO score: Increased from 71 to 100 / Backlinks: Increased from 9 to 226
 - Average keyword position: Improved from 59 to 18.62
 - Expanded landing pages from 5 to 110 SEO-optimized pages - website: www.onebargroup.dk
 - Compiled an attack list of 500+ potential clients, including venues, companies, and agencies
 - Created brand universe for event concepts - both online and print
 - Created a new website and also developed a webshop primarily targeting B2C

- Udvikling, implementering og evaluering af markedskampagner - både B2C, B2B og B2B2C
- Ansvarlig for marketingteam og for marketingaktiviteter for Cocktail Company, IsTilFest og 3 barer
- Lead på marketingaktiviteter på tværs af on- og offline (SEO, Google Ads, SoMe, messer)
- Udvikling og implementering af strategier med fokus på brand awareness og vækst
- Lead på budget, leads, bureauer og interne teams
- Fokus på content og account based marketing - samt sikring af konsistent brandidentitet
- Leder for web-designer, marketing koordinator og copywriter.

- Udviklede og implementerede aktiveringsstrategier for at fremme brandkendskab og engagement.
- Sikrede succesfuld lancering af nye produkter ved events med fokus på målrettet forbrugeraktivering
- Lead på projekter med interne stakeholders samt festivaler og On-Trade kunder
- Udvikling af aktiviteter og materialer til at sikre eksponering og give øget salg
- Analyse og opsætning af KPI’er for at optimere fremtidige aktiveringsindsatser og maksimere ROI
- Projekt lead på eventkoncept i samarbejde med On-Trade kunder med budget på +1 mio
- Udviklingen af content til sociale medieaktiviteter, som førte til øget synlighed og kundeinteraktion

Best case Digital: In charge of Cocktail Studio for 36 months. Results: 31K Facebook fans - 19.000.000 Facebook exposures and 5K Instagram fans. 5K Cocktail Studio books sold online and bookstores. Web-shop created with e-commerce partner. 

Best case Event: Created a concept and event with 25 influencers and customer events with a strategic media partner. Results: 15 positive influencers and 100 happy end consumers. +800K exposures generated.

Brand & Portfolio Management:
- Implementation and development of strategic brand directions in alignment with stakeholders
- Advertising & Promotion budget management for own brand portfolio
- Brand Profit & Loss input and control for own brand portfolio
- Market and competitive analysis, consumer insights generation
- Control of CSR guidelines
- Experience with route to market strategies -> Last: Lillet relaunch with influencers, SoMe, and PR

Activity Planning:
- Development, implementation, and evaluation of activities in HoReCa and Retail - ATL and BTL
- Media and Creative Agency management
- Involvement and alignment with Trade Marketing and Activation Manager functions

- Supporting Brand Managers on coordination and implementation of on-trade promotions for key brands 
- Creating a digital cross-brand univers called CocktailStudio with large succes 25K fans on facebook within 2 years. Also arranged with Politikens Forlag to have a nice book published in 4.000 copies for sale. 
- Sales/C&C support: development /production of sales brochures, trade ads and special POS materials for C&C 
- Budget responsibility for key brand projects, events and support to sales 
- Reporting and evaluations of all activities and competing brand activation for monthly reports and ad hoc presentations, event plans etc. 
- Coordination of hospitality & training programs as well as brand advocacy programs for consumers and bartenders 
- Planning and implementation of key brand projects and events in selected key On-trade accounts 
- Event coordination for large events (e.g. summer festivals, events and fairs)

- Development, implementation and execution of marketing strategies on behalf of various clients 
- Development, execution and optimization of online communication plans 
- Optimisation of sales and marketing campaigns as well as initiatives at both strategic and execution 
- Project management on internal projects and customers’ projects and campaigns 
- Customer contact with focus on additional sales and active sales efforts 
- Development of concepts, visual identities and promotions as well as photography and video

- Development, implementation, and execution of marketing strategies
- Adjusting and optimizing international campaigns and material for the Danish market 
- Development of strategy, budget, and action plan for marketing activities on an annual basis 
- Planning of marketing activities and budget allocation: ATL and BTL 
- Strategic planning of 360° campaigns and media spending across offline and online platforms 
- Defining and setting objectives for marketing activities 
- Market research based on numbers from GFK and AC Nielsen 
- Start-up and selection, as well as cooperation with PR, advertising, media, and event agencies 
- Negotiating contracts with external agencies and other partners 
- Develop new partnerships that contribute to greater visibility and increased sales 
- Concept development and collaboration with brand ambassadors 
- Responsible for the planning, implementation, and execution process of fairs and events 
- Production of trade marketing material regarding product launches and other promotional activities 
- Responsible for budgets, production of materials and services according to budget
- Development and digitization of sales materials and presentations for print, online and tablet 
- Development and production of display solutions, shop-in-shop, print and POS materials 
- SEO, SEM, and online marketing at a strategic and practical level

- Responsible for communication platforms; websites, print, newsletters, etc,
- Brand building activities, strategic marketing plans and campaigns
- Development of materials for sales team and stores; presentations, POS-materials 
- Customer service, tasks in Concorde C5 and various administrative tasks

received.caption: August 3, 2023, Mathias worked with Martin but on different teams
received.text:
Jeg har haft den store fornøjelse at arbejde sammen med Martin Tang, da han fungerede som Marketing Manager hos Friday Group. Selvom vi ikke arbejdede direkte sammen i samme team, var vi alligevel tætte kollegaer og deltog i mange vellykkede projekter sammen.

Martin er en ekstraordinær kollega, der altid har fokus på produktets kvalitet og effektivitet. Han er ikke bange for at trække ærmerne op og tilbyde sin hjælp til enhver kollega, der har brug for det. Hans dedikation og engagement i arbejdet har været en inspirerende faktor.

Som markedsføringsspecialist har Martin demonstreret en dybtgående forståelse for de komplekse aspekter af markedsføring. Hans strategiske tilgang og kreative evner har været et værdifuldt aktiv for Friday Group, og han har bidraget til at løfte virksomhedens brand til nye højder.

Det er ingen overraskelse, at Martin blev kåret som Årets Kollega på tværs af hele koncernen i 2022 - en anerkendelse, han fuldt ud fortjente. Han har bevist, at hårdt arbejde og en behagelig personlighed kan gå hånd i hånd og skabe både bemærkelsesværdige resultater og stærke relationer.

Jeg vil bestemt savne Martins tilstedeværelse og bidrag til teamet. Han er en unik person, og jeg er sikker på, at han vil fortsætte med at skabe succes uanset hvor han kommer til at arbejde i fremtiden.

Jeg vil gerne give mine bedste anbefalinger til Martin Tang og ønske ham al mulig succes i sine fremtidige projekter. Enhver arbejdsgiver eller samarbejdspartner vil være heldig at have Martin ombord, og jeg ser frem til at følge med i hans fremtidige bedrifter.

actor.headline: Head of Operations & Innovation at Cocktail Company

received.caption: February 23, 2021, Katrine worked with Martin on the same team
received.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Martin for 3,5 years at Pernod Ricard. 
Martin is an incredibly dedicated, hard working and talented colleague. He deals with any given task head on and is result driven and efficient. On top of this he is proactive and creative in his approach to marketing tasks. 
I have worked with Martin on everything from events to creating yearly brand plans and believe him to be highly skilled across all areas of the marketing field 

Finally, Martin is a likable colleague who is the first to offer a helping hand to anyone who needs it. A great team and co-worker who brings a positive attitude to any challenge.

received.caption: April 15, 2013, Thomas Madsbjerg worked with Martin on the same team
received.text:
Jeg har igennem de sidste mange år arbejdet sammen med Martin Tang Madsen, både hos AlBaline A/S og hos Empire / Sodastream Denmark, hvor vi i begge virksomheder, har arbejdet sammen med fokus på salg, markedsføring, nationale og interne kampagner.

Martin har igennem alle år udvist stor faglig dygtighed og har altid leveret et utrolig højt niveau på alle aspekter.Han formår i alle opgaver, at skabe en målrettet fokus i hele virksomheden, og ligeledes den rette motivation. Igennem hans faglige kompetencer og hans positive indgang bliver alle opgaver ført i mål til stor tilfredsstilles.

Jeg kan derfor kun give Martin, mine allerbedste anbefalinger og stiller mig mere end gerne til rådighed for uddybende spørgsmål.


Thomas Madsbjerg
Mail: madsbjerg@duul.dk - Tel. 61 31 91 51

given.text:
Jeg har haft fornøjelse af at arbejde sammen med Thomas både hos AlBaline A/S og hos Empire / SodaStream Denmark. Vi har løbende arbejdet tæt sammen med udvikling og optimering af salgs- og markedsføringskampagner.

Thomas har altid været en fornøjelse at arbejde sammen med på grund af hans gode humør og faglige dygtighed. Det er tydeligt at Thomas sætter en ære i sit arbejde og derfor altid leveret et utrolig højt niveau på alle aspekter.

En af Thomas’ løbende opgaver har været at undervise på Handelsfagskolen i Odder. Jeg har ikke selv overværet Thomas’
undervisning, men har hørt flere af tidligere elever rose ham for hans gode undervisningsform og faglige kompetencer, samt imødekommende væsen.

Jeg kan derfor kun give Thomas, mine allerbedste anbefalinger og stiller mig mere end gerne til rådighed for uddybende spørgsmål.

json.summary:
Jeg har en passion for at skabe orden og struktur! 
 
Igennem oprydning og organisering✨
 
Og mangler du hjælp til det, på enten din arbejdsplads eller i dit hjem - Ja, så er du landet på den helt rigtige profil!
 
Jeg er under uddannelsen Simple Life Organizer og du vil her på profilen få tips og tricks til hvordan du igennem oprydning og organisering kan skabe orden, struktur samt et let overblik over dine ting.
 
For det er der brug for i en travl hverdag, som vi alle kender til.
 
Jeg tror på at et ryddeligt og overskueligt miljø kan gøre en forskel for både dit velvære, men også din produktivitet. Det gælder både på din arbejdsplads og dit private hjem.
 
Jeg elsker at gøre en forskel for folk! 💪
 
At hjælpe dem med at give slip på det de ikke har brug for og få implementeret systemer der giver dem et overblik over de ting, de ikke kan undvære.
 
Og hvem ved. Måske du bliver inspireret til selv, at komme i gang med at få ryddet op og skabe overblik og ro! 😉
 
Hvis ikke, så er du velkommen til at sende mig en mail på julie@falk-tag.dk eller connecte her på LinkedIn.
 
Så er jeg sikker på, at jeg kan hjælpe dig!
 
Jeg glæder mig til at se mere til dig 😊

work_experience.description: Denmark Capital Partners is a company investing in Real Estate in emerging markets, providing great return on short-term investments. New business opportunities are also vetted through the company structure, as well as management consultancy and coaching.

Responsible for Projects in the Valhall, Hod, Ula, and Tambar Assets. Valhall has produced astonishing one billion boe since 1982, and we have ambitions producing another billion. The portfolio of projects is extensive and comprises an impressive suite of greenfield and brownfield projects, technology development (as digitalisation, automation, robotisation), as well as decommissioning and removal of old installations. Projects are executed mainly by means of Alliances in Integrated Teams. In the portfolio is the Hod project, which has been the symbolic bridge between the Covid-19/oil collapse crisis and the future for the contractor industry, which in Norway is needed for the green transformation. The Hod project has been delivered as promised, despite the pandemic. We will also transform Valhall by removing more than 40,000 tonnes steel from the Valhall area in the next few years, and create new infrastructure generating cash flow for the welfare and the green transformation for the benefit of the society. We will also create cash flow from the late life of Ula and Tambar, and we have a nice suite of projects including drilling new targets and exchanging power turbines.

Responsible for Projects in the Valhall and Hod Asset. Valhall has produced astonishing one billion boe since 1982, and we have ambitions producing another billion. Responsibilities

•	Manager for app. 150 persons in DONG Energy

Results
•	The first phase of the project – the substructure (the Jacket) was delivered on time and on budget (see youtube video in link below)
•	The second phase of the project was terminated March 2016 due to Contractors failure to meet the contract obligations.

work_experience.position: Senior Director - Head of Offshore Technology (Corporate Engineering & Operations dept.)
work_experience.description:
Offshore Technology was the corporate line department in DONG E&P (Exploration and Produc-tion) responsible for engineering, modifications, engineering maintenance, maintenance im-provements, subsea operations (including maintenance, inspections, diving operations, ROV oper-ations), and abandonment of installations. 


Responsibilities
•	Head of Department
•	Manage change of the department to be in line with the overall strategy of the company
•	Overall responsible for the project portfolio (100+ projects)
•	Yearly budgets in the range 150 mio DKK to 1.5 bn DKK. 
•	Duty Manager 2nd line emergency response
•	Member of Investment Advisory Board
•	Member of steering committees in major investment projects
•	Responsible for technical evaluation in M&A processes

Results 
•	Managed growth of department from 20 to 100 persons
•	Established high quality management system
•	Most projects were completed satisfactorily (>95% of 100+ projects)
•	Results from People satisfaction survey was increased from a score of 72 (in 2007) to 81 (in 2010).

work_experience.position: Project Director - Steel structural failure in offshore installation - Rescue mission
work_experience.description: A structural failure in the foundations of an offshore installation was observed, and hundreds of people internal and thousands of people external were engaged to rescue the platform from collapsing. Six months and several hundreds of million kroner later, we had been able not only to structurally secure the installation, but also to resume production. I was overall responsible for the crisis management and rescue mission.

Responsibilities
•	Operations Supervisor (Driftsleder)
•	Daily production of oil and gas (~25,000 bbl/d)
•	Maintenance, modification and repair activities
•	Budget 100 mio DKK

Results
•	Budgets, production forecast and safety goals were all met in 2005 and 2006
•	People satisfaction onboard increased, and with that the performance increased

Introduction
The STRONG project was an improvement project focusing on the operational aspects of the pro-duction of oil from the Siri Area fields through the processing Siri platform. The goals of the pro-ject were to reduce the operational expenditures (OPEX) with 43% (from DKK 220 mill. to DKK 128 mill.) and improve the production efficiency from 89.5% to 94.0% (potential for the coming year of about DKK 250 mill. through increased production) by means of restructuring, technical improvements and enhanced planning of activities. DONG E&P had a strategy of growth, which included acquiring operations of new fields in the North Sea. The STRONG project was a strategi-cally important project, as the Siri Area Asset was the only operating asset and the only opportuni-ty to show the industry how well DONG E&P managed to operate the production of oil and gas in an efficient manner. Together with this the STRONG project was the first major improvement project established in DONG E&P, and in this context a pilot project for improvements throughout the entire organization. STRONG was an abbreviation for Siri Top Rating in Operational Bench-marking, linking back to the McKinsey Benchmarking for Oil and Gas Operations as the measure of performance. One of the goals was to be amongst top quartile in McKinsey Benchmarking with respect to cost.

Responsibilities
•	Project Manager
•	Change agent

Results

•	All goals were reached, and then some: 
•	In 2006 Siri ended in the top 10% (goal: top 25%), and in 2014 Siri was still amongst the best. The project was in other words able to identify and implement changes that the or-ganization were able to maintain.  
•	Based on the positive results the growth strategy in DONG E&P accelerated

work_experience.position: Project Manager/Coordinator - Acquisition of Platform in the North Sea
work_experience.description:
Introduction
The Statoil shares in the Siri license was bought by DONG in July 2002 for 1 bn DKK, and the operatorship was transferred simultaneously. The project commenced one year earlier with negotiations with Statoil, and finalized 1½ years later before planned time and at cost. The transfer of the operatorship included management of different areas; as contracts, quality management system (procedures), software systems, documentations, authority issues, human resource issues, emer-gency response, change management, etc. As this was the first operatorship in DONG, the production department in DONG had to be established simultaneously with the transfer of operatorship. 

Responsibilities
•	First Project Coordinator, then Project Manager
•	Establishment of management systems
•	Monitor and control all activities
•	Establish new production department

Results
•	From signed agreement to take-over it took four months (said to be one of the fastest take-over in the industry)
•	All activities were executed according to plan, and the overall project was closed down ahead of plan

json.summary:
Driven to make a meaningful impact, I specialize in steering organisations and people towards sustainable growth through authentic leadership. With more than 20 years of experience, my portfolio spans across development, construction, change management, and mergers/acquisitions, managing budgets from millions to billions. My expertise in project management has significantly enhanced processes within line organizations, consistently yielding exceptional results.

Passionate about fostering organisational evolution, I excel in executing major turnarounds and strategic projects. Currently, I am applying my skills at Aker BP, the most interesting oil and gas company on the Norwegian Continental Shelf and maybe globally, where I continue to pursue my passion for building outstanding teams who deliver best-in-class projects. My commitment to sustainable growth through authentic leadership continues to be core to my professional journey.

As side hustles I love to assist leaders and organisations in their journey as coach/mentor and board member. I also write about leadership as it supports reflection on my own journey, and maybe others can gain from it as well...?

received.caption: March 19, 2018, Dr. Eva-Maria and Egil studied together
received.text:
Egil Nybakk is a man to dig deep and fly high. He is not the one to scratch the surface only. When he works with clients, he wants to make sure the result is in alignment with them. At the same time, he is a visionary who is able to recognise great results that lay in the future and are not visible yet. 
Egil is calm, wise and understanding. He is a great listener in the first place. Once he got to know the person or company he is engaging with, he shares his abundant knowledge and makes things happen. 
With Egil on your side, you can be sure to reach your goals.

received.text:
Egil recruited me to the Hejre Arbitration team in 2015, and his speak about the project motivated me to say ‘yes’ straight away and to be a part of the project.
Egil is a great motivator and inspirator, he ensures to involve all team members in all aspects of the project.  Egil has also great skills in putting a project team together, with various disciplines, age, gender and personalities, which were very much shown in the Arbitration Project team. A teambuilding in the beginning of the project made the foundation for a great team spirit, in fact the best team spirit I ever have experienced in a project before. Everyone contributed and helped each other cross disciplines to make it happen, and Egil played a big role in that.
Egil is good to see the big picture but also capable of seeing the details, and stay focused on the task, which was very much needed in the project. Even though there were pressure and tight deadlines Egil stayed calm. Even though we were busy Egil had always time for questions and didn’t mind to explain more technical aspects to me.
Egil is organised and works in a structured way. He is always positive and he is very pleasant to work with, and you are lucky if you also get the chance.

actor.headline: Lead Information Management Specialist at Ørsted

received.caption: February 6, 2018, Egil was Marisa’s client
received.text:
Egil Nybakk invited me to join the Hejre project in 2013. Some would say a very audacious decision to take in a consultant, specialized in building cultural intelligence into a highly technical complex and prestigious oil and gas project. 
However, this act - to swim against the stream and trust in your gut feeling - is something that characterizes Egil. He is not a man who relies on what worked yesterday. On the contrary. He is a person who constantly sees new opportunities and dares to take action. Every action is anchored in his clear purpose and explicit values.   
Often he finds these opportunities tied in people's resources, skills or competences. It has been a pleasure to observe Egil in the Hejre project and see how he as a leader navigates a challenging and complex project by motivating people and igniting their passion. I admire Egil for his ability to motivate people and teams with diverse backgrounds and different perspectives. He is strong at visualizing the common goal and equipping the people around him with what they need to fulfil their part of the job.   
When everything looks black and conflicts are harsh, he has shown remarkable strength, business acumen and emotional intelligence in making both sides of the conflict meet to collaborate towards a common purpose.   
I have learned a great deal from Egil and I would love to work with him again.

received.text:
Egil has been my colleague and boss for app. 15 years in DONG E&P. For 4 years I reported directly to Egil. 
I was Deputy in a fast growing department. Due to organizational changes, the department needed a new Head. I knew Egil as an ambitious, eager and skillful colleague. Hence, I contacted our Vice President and suggested Egil as my new boss. The VP agreed and Egil became my boss for four years. I have never regretted that.
During those years I experienced Egil as leader, who is loyal to people and decisions. Egil is a good ambassador for humor. He can be tough, but he is (almost) always fair.
In the most stressful period during those years, our offshore platform was literally at stake due to structural integrity issues.  Egil was fantastic in that period. He organized and headed an Asset rescue team. He was able to stay calm and have focus on the target in this severe situation, which lasted more than 6 months. I believe that neither Egil, nor myself have been more challenged or learned more so fast ,than in this critical time.
It has been a privilege to work with Egil. And I would not hesitate to do it again.

Lucky are those who got Janus in their team.

Tony certainly lived up to his promises, and more to it. He got control of all technical issues, but he is even more admirable when it comes to dealing with people, whether it's within own organisation, clients or subcontractors. 

He is extremely hard-working, dedicated, and goal-oriented. It was a pleasure working with Tony, and hopefully I will have the opportunity again some day.

given.text: Lars recruited me in 2001, and he was my leader for 10 years. It was surely the best 10 years of my career, as Lars gave me the opportunity to grow exponentially through challenging tasks and projects. All the time Lars was there to guide and coach. Lars is an extremely dedicated professional, who is very goal-oriented and focused. He expects people to deliver according to their abilities, and he pushes individuals to do so, but he is always the first person to be supportive if a person is making a mistake. Lars has taught me the most important lessons running a business, and what it really takes to be successful. He wasn't only amazingly successful himself - he made me successful.

He is an extremely great problem-solver, and he has an extraordinary network, which provides him with updates on the industry and knowledge all the time. actor.headline: Asset Engineer hos INEOS Oil & Gas Denmark

given.caption: June 4, 2015, Egil was Marisa’s client
given.text:
In 2012 Marisa opened my eyes to the importance of cultural intelligence, and that was the entrance to a close cooperation full time in Paris for six months. The way that Marisa guided me and our team through the understanding and implications of cultural differences was with patience and dedication. Surely Marisa is totally on top of the theory of cultural intelligence, but it is the implementation that makes Marisa different from other consultants and advisors. Marisa is truly interested in the persons she is working with, and her natural ability to get people to open their hearts and minds makes Marisa to a great catalyst in improving the collaboration in any teams. She showed that whatever nationality we were working with – French, Dutch, Norwegian, Korean, English – she were able to break through, get their attention and awaken their interest for getting together to solve the tasks ahead. 
 
Marisa is very structured and analytical, and she is able to verbally as well as in writing to communicate her observations, findings and learnings in a respectful and effective way. She has the ability to communicate clearly with all layers in an organisation, and she comes forward with great authority, but also with humbleness for what she does not possess the expertise within. Engineers, document controllers, managers, etc seems to embrace Marisa’s presence, as she makes their daily work easier. She uses easy and simple tools as frequent invitation for lunch or dinner, but also more sophisticated tools as LEGO Serious Play (Marisa holds a certification). 
 
I have also with great success used Marisa for other purposes than solely within cross-cultural challenges, and she is a great coach, both personally as well as within a management team. She has the ability and courage to put focus on the stinking fish, and she makes people reflect on behaviours and routines. Marisa is the kind of person that you will remember from the rest, no matter the circumstance; a project, conference, course, or a party. 

I highly recommend using Marisa for coach and cross-cultural matters.

given.caption: April 29, 2025, Peter managed Therese directly
given.text:
Det er med stor glæde, at jeg giver varmeste anbefaling til Therese, som i sin tid som praktikant og eventmedarbejder i vores eventafdeling har været en uvurderlig del af vores team. Therese har arbejdet på både store og små events, og hun har hjulpet i flere afdelinger. Hendes høje serviceniveau og professionelle tilgang har været en stor del af succesen bag vores private fester og firmaarrangementer.
Fra første dag har Therese udvist en smittende venlighed og et stort engagement i sit arbejde. Hun er altid serviceminded og møder både gæster og kollegaer med et smil og en positiv attitude. Som kollega er Therese en glæde at arbejde sammen med. Hun bidrager med en god energi, tager ansvar og hjælper altid sine kollegaer, når behovet opstår.
Ansvarsområder og præstationer:
Modtagelse og betjening af gæster med fokus på venlighed, professionalisme og høj service.
Koordinering af servering og andre opgaver under både private fester og firmaarrangementer.
Ledelse af events, herunder planlægning, fordeling af opgaver og sikring af, at alt forløber som planlagt.
Træning og vejledning af kollegaer for at sikre et stærkt og samarbejdende team.
Sikring af en positiv og mindeværdig oplevelse for alle gæster.
 
Derudover har Therese gode lederegenskaber og går gerne forrest, når der er brug for en stærk og struktureret hånd. Jeg vil altid anbefale Therese til enhver, der søger en dygtig og dedikeret medarbejder

json.summary:
Reklamebureau Highlight havde 27 år på bagen inde vi slog os sammen med vores søsterfirmaet Cool Gray. Hvilket er vores navn i dag.

Highlight og Cool Gray slog deres kommunikationsaktiviteterne sammen den 1 juni 2016, hvilket betyder at vi i dag kan tilbyde alt lige fra koncept, kommunikation, strategi, taktik, kreativitet, digitale løsninger, foto og video, udstillingsmaterialer og emballage i alle afskygninger – for ikke at nævne, produktion, tryk offline og digitalt, lagerføring, logistik, lagerhotel og  meget mere.   

Vi er kort sagt blevet et Full-service kommunikationsbureau med eksperter på hvert område og så i samme hus. Det vil sige ingen fordyrende mellemled.

Cool Gray er et besøg vær, hvor du som kunde kan få en masse ideer og inspiration.

Du kan selvfølgelig handle hos os, der hvor dine behov er, om det er digitalt eller om det er offline, så vil der altid være eksperter på hvert område, som kan hjælpe dig.

Kontakt mig for en rundvisning på Cool Gray, det er virkelig et stort,  spændende og inspirerende hus der rummer 175 dygtige kollegaer. Rundvisningen er selvfølgelig helt uden forpligtelser.

Skriv her på linkedin eller ring på tlf. 50601060. Du kan også skriv til mig på min e-mail adresse som er lars.kamstrup@coolgray.dk

De bedste hilsner
Lars

Akademimerkonom i Organisation og Ledelse, Human Resources

work_experience.description:
I focus on the Nordic strategic tasks within HR in Edda Group alongside my current position in Moment in Denmark.
In Edda Group, we are on the journey to becoming the leading provider of flexible work solutions in the Nordics. Our goal in HR is to support all our colleagues in creating added value for our customers and employees. Every day we aim to create a workplace with well-being, engagement, development, and good working conditions in general. 
Within my responsibilities is working with ESG – environment, sustainability, and governance. 
The ESG focus should contribute to attracting and engaging skilled colleagues and ensuring gender balance and fair treatment for all by providing HR programs and other systems and processes. Furthermore, our goal is to secure legal compliance within all aspects of the business. 
With honest, fair, and lean operations, we aim to secure unbiased processes, develop skills, provide high ethical standards, and provide guidance for our candidates, consultants, and customers.

work_experience.position: HR Director - Head of People & Culture
work_experience.description:
Som Head of People & Culture, har jeg et ansvar på tværs af hele organisationen for trivsel og kultur, herunder hele HR-paletten, og med et særligt fokus på at det skal være sjovt at gå på arbejde.

Moment er specialister i at skabe det rette match mellem kvalificerede jobsøgere og attraktive virksomheder – uanset om det gælder vikariater, studie- og deltidsjob, kortere interim-ansættelser eller rekruttering til et fast karrierejob.
Siden Moment i 1997 blev stiftet, har vores målsætning været at gøre det nemt for virksomheder og kandidater at komme i kontakt med hinanden, og vi gør det intelligent, fleksibelt og med kvalitet. 
I 2022 matchede vi mere end 10.000 talentfulde mennesker med danske virksomheder inden for udvalgte fagområder i hele landet. Og det er jeg stolt af at være en del af. 

Hos Moment fortsætter vi med at udbygge vores netværk af talentfulde kandidater og virksomheder. Vi anvender erfarne rekrutteringskonsulenter og gør brug at de nyeste teknologier, hvor det giver mening. Vi kan derfor tilbyde vores kunder de dygtigste vikarer og mest veluddannede kandidater.

Ansvarlig for kommunikation, marketing & salgssupport i Moment - herunder sourcing, branding og tilbudsgivning ifm. udbud.
Fortsat en del af Moment ledelse, med fokus på virksomhedens strategiske udvikling og projektledelse.

Den vigtigste opgave for mig, at Moments medarbejdere trives og at der er fokus på samarbejdet og fællesskabet, således at vi kan løse kerneopgaven i Moment bedst muligt.

Som ansvarlig for Moments leveranceforretning har jeg et strategisk fokus på at udvikle forretningen og dernæst operationel eksekvering i samarbejde med ledere og medarbejdere, som sikrer kvalitet i alle vores processer. 

Jeg er stolt af at være en del af Moment, der hvert år bringer mere end 6.000 talentfulde og dygtige mennesker videre i deres karriere.
Moment er førende indenfor branchen, med 100 ansatte, mere end  500 rekrutteringer om året, 900 i interim og projektansættelser og samtidig mere end 1500 studerende og vikarer der hver ude sendes ud i job på det danske arbejdsmarked. 

Vi søger altid den intelligente løsning, rådgiver virksomheder i fastholdelse og udvikling af medarbejdere og sikrer hurtigere ”time to performance” ved en målrettet og integreret onboarding indsats.

Moment udbyder studiejob og deltidsvikariater med speciale i de studerende, samt løsninger inden for fuldtidsvikariater og -rekrutteringer for alle typer af profiler.

Siden Moment i 1997 blev stiftet af to studerende, har det været vores målsætning at gøre det nemt for virksomheder og jobsøgere at komme i kontakt med hinanden. Målsætningen er at gøre det intelligent, fleksibelt og med kvalitet. Vi anvender erfarne rekrutteringskonsulenter og nogle af markedets mest nytænkende it-løsninger. Derfor kan vi tilbyde vores kunder de dygtigste vikarer og mest veluddannede kandidater.

Som Konsulentchef har jeg blandt andet følgende ansvarsområder:

- Budget og forecast
- Udvikling, coaching og fastholdelse af medarbejdere
- Udvikling og implementering af strategi
- Personaleplanlægning og ansættelse af medarbejdere
- Planlægning og eksekvering af interne workshops og seminarer
- Sikre best practice og compliance i interne processer og arbejdsflow
- Implementering af værdier og konkretisere dem til adfærd i hverdagen
- MUS-samtaler, opfølgning og handleplaner
- Implementering af performance-management system
- Implementering af team-struktur og specialisering af konsulenter
- Juridisk ansvarlig for vikarområdet vedr. overenskomster, vikarlov, kontrakter og generelle vilkår
- Fokus på optimering og udvikling af it-systemer og arbejdsprocesser
- Projektledelse

Dagligt ansvar for 2 forskellige teams bestående af hver 8 Rekrutteringskonsulenter samt Receptionsteamet bestående af 4 medarbejdere.

Opgaver:
•	Rekruttering, ressourceplanlægning og onboarding
•	Performance, MUS og løn-samtaler
•	Budgetter og forecast
•	Sparring, koordinering og uddelegering af opgaver
•	Ferie- og vagtplanlægning
•	Kompetenceudvikling og planlægning af seminarer
•	Administrative opgaver med opdatering af personaledatabase
•	Håndtering af langtidssygemeldinger, barselsorlov mm.
•	Udvikling af it-systemer
•	Problemknuser og håndtering af kundesager
•	Projektstyring og optimering af interne arbejdsprocesser

Ansvarlig for egen portefølje af kunder og udvikling samt implementering af deres bemandingsløsninger.

Opgaver:
•	Rekruttering fra A-Z
•	Stillingsopslag, screening personlige interviews og test
•	Kontraktindgåelse og vagtplanlægning
•	Kundeansvarlig
•	Behovsafdækning, opfølgning, status og mersalg
•	Planlægning af vikararrangementer
•	Udvikling og fastholdelse af vikarer
•	Mentor for nye medarbejdere
•	Projektdeltagelse for udvikling af arbejdsprocesser

Netgen er en anderledes it-konsulentvirksomhed, hvor vi dækker et stadigt voksende behov for effektivt at selektere, introducere, udvikle og matche IT-talenter til vores kunders ambitiøse digitaliseringstransformationer. 
 
Fremtidige IT-løsninger kræver både innovation og erfaring. Netgen sikrer, i et tæt partnerskab med vores kunder, en effektiv, processtærk leverance af dygtige, agile og ambitiøse unge IT-talenter, støttet af vores erfarne mentorer og tilpasset til kundens modenhed og kultur.
 
Netgen er et nyt firma, og alligevel ikke. Før vi blev Netgen i januar 2020, var vi en del af Moment. Vi er stadig ejet af Moment - men vi opererer uafhængigt i den daglige drift.

Min rolle i Netgen har været at få implementeret processer og systemer, så virksomheden er kommet godt fra start. Det har betyder integration af nye it-systemer, opbygning af leverance-processer, udarbejdelse af jurdiske dokumenter, budgetter og forecast og alt det der kommer oven i.

Det har været fantastisk at være med til at søsætte en ny virksomhed som allerede har god vind i sejlene!

Stewardesse på europæiske og indenrigsflyvninger.
Bred kontaktflade med sikkerhed, høj kundeservice og samarbejde i fokus.
Salgsassistent på deltid med ansvar for at betjene indenlandske og udenlandske kunder med fokus på højt serviceniveau.

Rejsekonsulent i teamet for grupperejser med ansvar for at sælge og koordinere rejser i hele verden.

Opgaver:
•	Indhentning og udarbejdelse af tilbud på flybilletter, hotelophold og rundrejser
•	Udstedelse og fakturering af arrangementer
•	Kundebesøg og møder med leverandører
•	Deltagelse i projekter med fokus på optimering af arbejdsprocesser blandt andet arbejdsflow på tværs af afdelinger samt it-optimeringer
Kontorelev med fokus på grupperejser
